## Description


**Queries Affected**

- [ ] Argument

- [ ] Big Roi

- [ ] Sub Indexing

- [ ] Operations

- [ ] Collections


**Response To Command**

- [ ] nothing happens at all

**Error Message**

- [ ] error message appears in a pop-up

- [ ] an exception trace back is printed in the sublime console(Ctrl + \`)

- [ ] the command fails silently
